Snipe Server API Documentation

package snipe.cache

class Cache

extended by QuestDataCache, UserCache

Base data cache class, all data cache modules should extend it. Data blocks are described in detail in Data Blocks article.

Fields

hasParams:Bool

Does the database table have params column?

name:String

Module name. Set in constructor of child class.

paramsFormat:String

params column contents format. Can be json or haxe.

tableName:String

Database table name.

Methods

dynamic load (id:Int):Block

Loads block from database. Called when CacheManager.get() does not have this block loaded. Should be overridden in case of custom-format blocks.

Should use manager.query() for SQL queries.

Returns:

New block with this ID.

dynamic save (block:Block):String

Gets SQL query that will save this block into database. Should be overriden in case of custom-format blocks.

Returns:

SQL query string.
